nuwaraeliya athithaye waradikaruwan pituwahal kala elimahan siragatha pradeshayak bawata pathwa thibu bawata sadhaka atha. 1628 di kanda udarata raja kala wimaladharmasuriya raju maha parangi yuddhayen pasu dona kathrina hewath kusumasana dewiya samaga sangawi sitinnata pamina aththe da nuwaraeliya pradeshayata bawa ithihasa wartha dakwayi. 1681 robat noks rachana kala kruthiyehi athi lanka sithiyame da nuwaraeliya lakunu kara thibe.
